activities: Personal information received by EJ Group, Inc. (referred to as EJ) from the EU relating to personnel will be used for purposes such as succession planning, salary planning, promotions and transfers, and other business purposes. In addition, EJ collects personal information about its customers to evaluate and grant rights to access information posted on the EJ web site, to supply requested services, to communicate with registrants concerning their use of the web site, to monitor for misuse of EJ’s proprietary information, for support and notification of new services, for marketing, to gather registrants’ views about EJ services, and to notify registrants about important changes or developments to the web site or EJ services.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
industrysector: Airport & Ground Support Equipment - (APG)Building Products - (BLD)Iron & Steel - (IRN)
recoursemech: EJ Group, Inc. (referred to as EJ) will seek resolution of a complaint or dispute regarding disclosure of personal information that can't be remedied by EJ, in accordance with the dispute resolution procedures of the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Principles.
